author: Karina Roman
title: Evidence mounts of COVID-19 'silent spreaders'
description: Researchers are finding mounting evidence that asymptomatic COVID-19 carriers are "driving" the rapid spread of the virus around the globe — contradicting what Canadian officials were saying just weeks ago.
content:
Researchers are finding mounting evidence that asymptomatic COVID-19 carriers are "driving" the rapid spread of the virus around the globe contradicting what Canadian officials were saying just weeks ago.
